Package View.Elements

Class ViewCard

java.lang.Object
View.Elements.ViewCard
Direct Known Subclasses:
ViewRotatableCard
public class ViewCard extends Object
Class used to provide the Card a graphic representation. It contains the default images for the normal and rotated BACK_CARD. The class has two images, one for the painted image, that can be the BACK_CARD image, and one for the card image, related to the Card
Author:
Luigi D'Annibale, Daniele Venturini

  • Method Details

    • buildCard

      private void buildCard()
      Gets the related image of the Card with the combination of the default path, the deck style, the value of the card + the color of the card and the extension .png.
      For example, DRAWRED.png

    • contains

      public boolean contains(Point point)
      Checks if the clicked point is in the card position
      Parameters:
      point - the point clicked
      Returns:
      true if the card has been clicked, false otherwise
